1370: Blankard moved to Den Hof.D.2 after marriage.
Got married to Siburgis at age 23 in 1370.
1372: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Lutghardis, at age 25.
1374: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Kerstine, at age 27.
1377: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Sybillia, at age 30.
1378: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Rabburgis, at age 31.
1380: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Reymodis, at age 33.
1381: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Marisseis, at age 34.
1383: Lost daughter Reymodis when Reymodis was 4 years old.
1385: Lost daughter Marisseis when Marisseis was 5 years old.
1388: Lost daughter Sybillia when Sybillia was 12 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1392: Had a daughter with Siburgis, Oderada, at age 45.
